Jack de Valpine wrote:


> Hi Rob,
> 
> Wow, big improvement!
> 
> I may not have communicated well about which option to use. The option I 
> meant was the last one with the one polygon that closes the coffer. I 
> was counting 1, 2, 3 after the base case diagram, sorry.


OK, thanks for the clarification.  But I need to use the last option 
anyway, because a closer inspection of my coffers (it's not my model) 
shows that the baffles do project below the ceiling plane.  So I have a 
depressed box around it.




> As far as the light "artifacts" around the coffers, I have to guess that 
> those are geometry. You may want to make sure everything is an illum 
> type. And  also triple check the orientation of polygons (maybe make 
> them lights or glows and objview just the light polygons to check 
> orientation.


OK, I'll dissect the scene files, thanks.
